operations.title: Administrator
operations.subtitle: Members with this permission have every permission and also bypass channel specific permissions. Granting this permission is dangerous

operations.title: View Audit Log (@todo: add audit logs)
operations.subtitle: Members with this permission have access to view the servers audit logs

operations.title: Manage Organisation
operations.subtitle: Members with this permission can change the organisation name and other organisation details

operations.title: Manage Roles
operations.subtitle: Members with this permission can create/edit/delete roles inside this organisation

operations.title: Manage channels
operations.subtitle: Members with this permission can create/edit/delete channels inside this organisation

operations.title: Manage webhooks (@todo: implement webhooks)
operations.subtitle: Members with this permission can create, edit and delete webhooks

operations.title: Manage own messages
operations.subtitle: Members with this permission can edit/delete their own messages inside channels

operations.title: Manage messages
operations.subtitle: Members with this permission can edit/delete messages inside channels

operations.title: Manage reactions
operations.subtitle: Members with this permission can add new reactions to a message
